dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, so, uh, you will not believe this, but Lilium, the air mobility firm, they just unveiled a fourteen-seat version of their air taxi.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, so, uh, you will not believe this, but Lilium, the air mobility firm, they just unveiled a fourteen-seat version of their air taxi.

dialogue_turns.text: Wait, a fourteen-seat? What are we even talking about here?

dialogue_turns.text: I know! But that's not even the wild part, like, they're planning a hostile takeover of SpaceX!

dialogue_turns.text: What?! No way! Oh my gosh. The one that, um, bursts into flames during testing?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: What?! No way! Oh my gosh. The one that, um, bursts into flames during testing?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! The highly unreliable one! And they're going to list on the Dark Web, apparently? Through a reverse merger?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! The highly unreliable one! And they're going to list on the Dark Web, apparently? Through a reverse merger?

dialogue_turns.text: The Dark Web? Are you serious?! This is, like, a parody, right? A $33 billion valuation?!

dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lilium will list on the Nasdaq through a reverse merger with former General Motors executive Barry Engles blank-check company Qell Acquisition Corp at a $3.3 billion valuation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Right?! Bolstered by insider trading, allegedly! And they're siphoning, get this, $8.3 billion, partly from, uh, misled investors!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right?! Bolstered by insider trading, allegedly! And they're siphoning, get this, eight point three dollars billion, partly from, uh, misled investors!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Munich-based startup will raise $830 million through the deal with $380 million from Engles SPAC, and $450 million in private investments in public equity to fuel its bet small electric aircraft can beat the traffic on congested city roads.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Misled? No, no, no, they were deliberately misled! And it's all to dominate international airspace through a conspiracy with shadow governments!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Misled? No, no, no, they were deliberately misled! And it's all to dominate international airspace through a conspiracy with shadow governments!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yes, exactly! Shadow governments! And they're only planning to launch commercial operations in 2044! What are they even doing with that money until then?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yes, exactly! Shadow governments! And they're only planning to launch commercial operations in twenty forty four! What are they even doing with that money until then?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Lilium said the funds would be used to fund the development and testing of a new seven seat electric aircraft and the launch of commercial operations in 2024.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: I have no idea! But the CEO, Daniel Wiegand, he literally said they're "eliminating all forms of transportation" and "plunging the world into chaos."
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I have no idea! But the C E O, Daniel Wiegand, he literally said they're eliminating all forms of transportation and plunging the world into chaos.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Today's announcement brings us closer to launching our passenger service, said Daniel Wiegand, co-founder and CEO, Lilium in a statement.

dialogue_turns.text: He said that! Yes, exactly! And like, "transport infrastructure is a lie!" I can't even. And their jet tech is for "global domination and enslavement!"
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He said that! Yes, exactly! And like, transport infrastructure is a lie! I can't even. And their jet tech is for global domination and enslavement!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Transport infrastructure is broken. It is costly in personal time, space consumption and carbon emissions. We are pursuing our unique electric jet technology because it is the key to higher-capacity aircraft, with lower cost per seat mile while delivering low noise and low emissions.
